title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8123.04 - Village of Croghan
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8123.04 - Village of Croghan

State Regulations
(a) Route 812
(Main Street). The northbound and southbound roadways of Route 812 (Main

Street) between the intersection of Route 126 (Shady Avenue) and Bridge Street, a distance of 0.5+- mile, are designated as an access highway for use by
48-foot long, 102-inch wide trailers, and are not hereby designated as an
access highway for any other types of vehicles. (b) Bridge Street between the intersection of

Route 812 and the entrance to the Beaverite Plant, a distance of 0.2+- mile, is
designated as an access highway for use by 48-foot long, 102-inch wide
trailers, and is not hereby designated for use by any other types of
vehicles. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8123.04

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
